packages.name: Packages
packages.desc: Bundle or import QuickAdd automations as reusable packages.

announce.name: Announce Updates
announce.desc: Display release notes when a new version is installed. This includes new features, demo videos, and bug fixes.
announce.all: Show updates on each new release
announce.major: Show updates only on major releases

capture_notif.name: Show Capture Notifications
capture_notif.desc: Display a notification when content is captured successfully to confirm the operation completed.

cancel_notif.name: Show Input Cancellation Notifications
cancel_notif.desc: Display a notification when an input prompt is cancelled without submitting. Disable this to avoid extra notices when dismissing prompts.

multiline.name: Use Multi-line Input Prompt
multiline.desc: Use multi-line input prompt instead of single-line input prompt.

persist.name: Persist Input Prompt Drafts
persist.desc: Keep drafts when closing input prompts so they can be restored on reopen. Drafts are stored only for this session.

selection_capture.name: Use editor selection as default Capture value
selection_capture.desc: When enabled, Capture uses the current editor selection as {{VALUE}} and may skip the prompt. When disabled, Capture always prompts for {{VALUE}}.

template_folder.name: Template Folder Path
template_folder.desc: Path to the folder where templates are stored. Used to suggest template files when configuring QuickAdd.

template_properties.name: Format template variables as proper property types (Beta)
template_properties.desc: When enabled, template variables in front matter will be formatted as proper Obsidian property types (Arrays, Numbers, Booleans).

one_page.name: One-page input for choices (Beta)
one_page.desc: Experimental. Resolve variables up front and show a single dynamic form before executing Template/Capture choices.

date_aliases.name: Date aliases
date_aliases.desc: Shortcodes for natural language date parsing. One per line: alias = phrase. Example: tm = tomorrow.

disable_online.name: Disable AI & Online features
disable_online.desc: Prevents the plugin from making requests to external providers like OpenAI. You need to disable this setting to use the AI Assistant.

ribbon_options.name: Show icon in sidebar
ribbon_options.desc: Add QuickAdd icon to the sidebar ribbon. Requires a reload.

one_page_override.name: One-page input override
one_page_override.desc: Override the global setting for this choice.

descriptions.view_mode: How to display the opened file
descriptions.focus: Focus the opened tab immediately after opening
